content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Culinary delights, a selection of premium wines, piano music, games for children, a fun Easter egg hunt – the perfect family Easter in the cheerful ambience of Zagreb’s Esplanade Hotel

 

Easter Brunch at Zinfandel’s

 

Spend Easter with your loved ones in the magical ambience of Zinfandel’s restaurant, and leave lunch prep to top chefs. Homemade ham baked in puff pastry, horseradish cream, foie gras, walnut and honey pesto, roasted asparagus salad, octopus terrine, salmon caviar, Caesar’s salad with Pag island cheese, Esplanade traditional steak tartare, hand-chopped and prepared by your table, creamy horseradish soup with crispy bacon, unmissable oven-crisped Esplanade štrukli, veal fillet with caramelised baby carrots, duck leg confit with mlinci flatbread, wild sea bass with fennel or turbot fillet with kale – these are just some of the scrumptious dishes that await you at traditional Easter brunch. Add to that divine Easter desserts made by the Esplanade’s pâtissiers, sit back and enjoy the good vibes and piano music. Cheer up your kids with a creative Easter workshop – your youngest can expect a fun animator in an Easter bunny costume, numerous board games, colouring, and an exciting Easter egg hunt.

 

  • Easter brunch – Menu
  • Easter at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel – Press Release
Easter brunch is served on Easter, Sunday 17 April 2022, from 12:30 pm at Zinfandel’s restaurant (and the Oleander terrace, weather permitting). The number of guests is limited and it is recommended to book a table in advance. The price for Easter brunch with a glass of sparkling wine, entertainment for children, and a piano performance is HRK 890 per person, for children up to 6 years the price of lunch is HRK 450.

 

Reservation at Zinfandel’s restaurant:
T. +385 (0)1 4566 644
E. zinfandels@esplanade.hr
Easter weekend package at the Esplanade 
Toast to spring, explore Zagreb, and relax in the cheerful ambience of Zinfandel’s restaurant with a delicious feast of your favourite delicacies. 

 

This spring, take your family on an Easter weekend trip to Zagreb. Explore the many attractions and sights of the city, stroll through the beautiful green parks, meet new people, indulge in the Easter tradition, and experience the amazing feeling of spring in the air.

 

The overnight package includes: 
  • Overnight stay for two in the Superior Room (16-17 April 2022 or 17-18 April 2022)
  • Early check-in/late check-out
  • À la carte breakfast for two in your room or at the restaurant
  • Sumptuous Easter brunch in Zinfandel’s with a glass of sparkling wine (click for menu)
  • Free superfast Wi-Fi
  • Access to Health Club – option to use the fitness centre and sauna free of charge (with prior confirmed reservation)
  • Press Reader Hot Zone – download newspapers and magazines during your stay free of charge
Package price is EUR 339*
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FOR THE PACKAGE:
1 VAT is included in the price of the package.
2 The price of the package is for two people.
3 *The price in EUR (€) is for informational purposes only. The actual price depends on the exchange rate on the day of payment/checkout.
4 Tourist tax in the amount of EUR 1.6 per person per day is not included in the price.
5 It is possible to upgrade your room category at an additional charge (Deluxe, suite, etc.), as well as a surcharge for an extra night at a special price.
6 The offer is available subject to capacity and current epidemiological measures.
7 All other services and offers that are not listed in the package will be charged extra and can be ordered in advance when booking the package.
The Easter Package for two is EUR 339* and includes one overnight stay in the Superior Room, breakfast, and Easter brunch with welcome sparkling wine, animation for children, and a piano performance.
The number of packages and places in the restaurant is limited.
Book your accommodation, contact us:
T. +385 (0)1 45 666 00
E. reservations@esplanade.hr

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
